column4: do u know any reason the current fglrx drivers would detect my 9700 pro as a 9500 generic on UBUNTU linux XFREE86?
do u know any reason the current fglrx drivers would detect my 9700 pro as a 9500 generic on UBUNTU linux XFREE86?
they're known to be broken like that -- the new drivers, which are coming out next week (apparently) should fix this
